items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice flattering sweater
items.body: This is a nice quality sweater. Itâ€™s a little oversized and a good weight. Not too warm but still cozy and soft. It is a flattering fit and a nice style. The pocket adds a nice touch. It has slits on each side of the hips which adds to how flattering it is. I like the color too, nice soft brown color. Read more
items.author: Rachel R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and nice fit
items.body: Really cute and soft! Not too oversized so it still looks neat but roomy enough to be comfy. Pocket adds interest. Color is good. Read more
items.author: caryn clifford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the loose fit
items.body: I love this loose fitting sweater. The outside has a nice sheen to it which you canâ€™t tell in the advertisement pictures, but you can see it in my photo. I was pleasantly surprised with the shine and emerald green color. The sleeves are long and the dropped shoulder gives it a 90â€™s feel. You could wear this to work with the right accessories, or to the gym with leggings. Itâ€™s not too thick, so it is good for a cool fall day or for someone that gets hot at work easily, Great addition to fall wardrobes. Read more
items.author: GELSON

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised. Color is great for fall and winter.
items.body: I am 5'9 about 175-180 lbs. I ordered size L in green. It's definitely oversized side to side (which is fine). The sleeves are really long which I like. The material is not too thick, also not 'cuddly' - it's soft enough but not plushy. That's okay too. I wish that it was just a little bit longer, like CYA long. ðŸ˜ If we're buying something that's oversized sometimes we like to have it cover that part up too, along with any post holiday bulges! I really like the green color, it's very pretty. The price is reasonable. Read more
items.author: Linda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the color, good fit.
items.body: This is a very nice, decent quality, well made sweater. It is not overly heavy. The color is a really nice minty(?) green. The sleeves are a good length and it fits true to size. It is â€œoversizedâ€ but I think itâ€™s oversized just enough for the size I wearâ€¦thus true to size. (I know. Confusingâ€¦). Anyhow, the sweater is nice, a great gift idea or just a casual piece to wear anytime you want. Great with jeans or dress pants/skirt. Read more
items.author: Logan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks Expensive and Chic
items.body: I love minimalist sweaters, and this one hits the mark. The solid color, clean ribbed edges, and small pocket make it look like something from a higher-end brand. I styled it with gold jewelry and ankle boots, and the outfit looked effortlessly chic. Highly recommend if you like simple but stylish pieces. Read more
items.author: VICTOR PORRAS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Layering
items.body: This is the kind of sweater you keep reaching for because it works with everything. Iâ€™ve worn it over a tank, over a button-down, and even under a long coat. It layers without feeling restrictive, and the knit has enough structure that it doesnâ€™t look sloppy. The little pocket is subtle but cute. Definitely a staple piece for colder weather. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly oversized
items.body: This oversized pocket sweater is perfect for transitioning from fall to winter. Itâ€™s lightweight, making it great for cool fall temps and for wearing under coats in the winter. Itâ€™s perfectly oversized but can still be tucked if you prefer to wear it that way. Slightly longer in the back than the front. The material is a touch stiff, but not itchy. Order your regular size for an oversized fit or size down for a more tailored fit. Read more
items.author: Heather

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cream Beige, Mocha Brown, Nutmeg, Burgundy Red, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
